showerReviews.reviewText: â€¦ it's a nice size pool. They have both indoor and outdoor areas. Plenty of seating. Nice and clean pool and shower rooms. The staff is super friendly and helpful. Overall very impressed by this facility. You can rent the pool for â€¦

â€¦ like going here during the winter/ spring season. $5 for non-residents. You can bring a small cooler or tote bag for snacks and drinks. There are vending machines to use as well. The bathroom are dressing rooms to change and shower as well.
